short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A fun hide-and-seek game for your web browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing Hide & Seek, a thrilling browser extension designed to bring some fun to your workday without getting spotted by your boss! Our goal is to help you unwind with a quick, entertaining break while maintaining your stealthiness in the workplace.

Key Features:

- Easy-to-play hide and seek game right in your browser
- Engaging gameplay to keep you entertained during short breaks
- Stealth mode ensures your boss won't catch you playing
- Customize difficulty levels for a more challenging experience
- Track your scores and compete with colleagues for office bragging rights

How to Play:

1. Install the Hide & Seek extension and click the icon in your browser toolbar to begin.
2. The game will start, and your goal is to find changed characters on the screen.
3. Swiftly pause the game or switch to a work-related tab with our quick-hide functionality.4. 
4. Resume playing once the coast is clear and continue your quest for the top score!

Hide & Seek is the perfect way to take a quick mental break and have some fun during your workday while staying discreet. Install the extension now and add a touch of excitement to your daily routine!
